demos.title: Lisa is on Metformin
demos.body: A patient shares concerns about stomach discomfort possibly linked to metformin or a recently added probiotic, seeking guidance on managing symptoms.

demos.title: Gardener has BP
demos.body: A patient discusses feeling unusually tired and dizzy, possibly due to a new blood pressure medication, especially during outdoor activities like gardening.

demos.title: Tommy's Mum has Arthritis
demos.body: A concerned son reports unusual ankle swelling in his mother after starting a new arthritis prescription, seeking advice on potential interactions with her heart medication.
